tool_description: Estimates delivery dates and transit times based on service type, shipping zones, and carrier performance data.

ship_date.description: Planned ship date in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid carrier configuration: Carrier ID not found or inactive
Unsupported service type: Service type not available for delivery estimation
Invalid ship date: Ship date must be in the future and in ISO 8601 format
Invalid postal codes: Origin or destination postal codes are invalid
Transit time unavailable: Unable to calculate transit time for this route
Service not available: Requested service not available for this route on ship date
usage: Provide carrier_id, service_type, shipping_zone, ship_date, and postal codes. Optionally specify Saturday delivery. Returns estimated delivery information.

transit_days.description: Expected transit time in business days

estimated_delivery_date.description: Estimated delivery date in ISO 8601 format

delivery_by_time.description: Expected delivery time (e.g., 'End of Day', '10:30 AM')

confidence_level.description: Confidence level of estimate (High, Medium, Low)
